name: Humanity’s Protector
description:
Created for ScoreSpace 17, around the theme of ‘Protect’.

You are the last hope for humanity, you have to protect the few who survive and scavenge for ammo during the day before they come out...

Controls

Explained in game, they change depending on the screen.

Main menu 

WAD / Arrow keys / Space - movement

Game

WASD - Movement

1 - Arms

2 - Knife

3 - Pistol

4 - SMG

5 - Shotgun

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Credits
